fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Climate Action
head_office_address: Christian Aid Ireland Canal House, Canal Road Dublin 6
eu_initiatives:
For our work on climate change we are following the ENVI committee, the Effort Sharing Regulation files and Renewables 
For our work on Tax Justice, we are following the EU Anti-money laundering directives, Country by Country reporting. 
Following also developments on country specific issues around Colombia and Israel and the occupied Palestinian territory.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
EURODAD, Brussels based network 
ACT EU ( Alliance of Churches Together)
goals__remit: Christian Aid Ireland is a development organisation, working globally in over 40 countries. We work for profound change that eradicates the causes of poverty, striving to achieve equality, dignity and freedom for all, regardless of faith or nationality. We are part of a wider movement for social justice. We provide urgent, practical and effective assistance where need is great, tackling the effects of poverty as well as its root causes.
